 Extractor.

Detailed Description

Representation of an exception object.

An instance of this class will maintain a list of errors representaed by SpkCompilerError.

int SpkCompilerException::find ( const enum SpkCompilerError::ErrorCode  code  )  const throw ()

Search the list for the error code.

Returns:
The location of the match within the list (>=0) when it is found. A negative number is returned when no entry is found.
Parameters:
